title: Why are schoolteachers so uptight? - Quora

response.answer_text: My wonderful and friendly Mom, Maureen, is a substitute teacher in our public school district. She was never uptight. The students all love her and the teachers she subs for always ask for her. She is one of the more popular subs. She is also very kind and loving. Some of the older students have even gotten “Hot for Teacher”. My Mom is a very sexy and considered a MILF

Have you ever had 20–40 people yelling, not doing what you asked, checking their phone every time they think you’re not looking, several times a day, day after day? You might get a little irritable. Students can be like customers that don’t want the product you’re selling but you have to sell to them anyways. Not every class is like this and not every teacher is uptight. Its better not to generalize. Some teachers are uptight because it’s their disposition. Some are uptight because they are tired.
